about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm a passionate frontend developer who loves crafting beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites. My journey in web development started back in 2023 when I discovered the magic of turning designs into interactive experiences with code.
about.paragraph2: Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working on a diverse range of projects — from small business websites to complex web applications. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences that make a difference in people's lives.
about.paragraph3: I'm constantly learning new technologies and best practices to stay current in this ever-evolving field. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
about.techTitle: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

companies.startup: Ministry of Digital Technologies of the Republic of Uzbekistan

senior: Worked as part of a team developing a web platform using React, TypeScript, React Query, and TailwindCSS.
Implemented UI components, adapted pages for different devices, and ensured consistent styling across the application.
Integrated frontend with API endpoints using React Query for data fetching, caching, and state updates.
Collaborated through Git/GitLab and participated in team discussions to organize tasks and improve the development process.
frontend: Helped develop a responsive website for an education center, working on page layout and UI components.
Assisted with connecting frontend parts to data and implementing basic interactive elements.
Used Git for simple version control tasks and collaborated with the team during development.
Learned to follow design layouts, adapt pages for different devices, and test pages before delivery.
junior: Helped with basic interface layout tasks and small updates for internal web pages.
Learned how digital services and government systems are organized.
Worked with Git for simple version control tasks and improved teamwork skills.
Assisted in testing small features and preparing simple documentation.

ecommerce.title: STAB - Study Abroad Planner
ecommerce.description: STAB is a Next.js application that helps students plan international studies by comparing living costs across major cities, calculating expenses, and finding universities and scholarships. Built with TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, it features currency conversion, Firebase authentication, and a student community platform.

taskManager.title: Football Blog
taskManager.description: Football Blog is a Next.js application that provides football fans with match analysis, player statistics, team comparisons, and latest news from leagues worldwide. Built with TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, it features real-time score updates, Firebase authentication, and a community platform for fans to discuss matches and share opinions.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.description: Real-time weather dashboard displaying current conditions. Features location search, favorite locations, and responsive design.

portfolioGen.title: Tash-tourist
portfolioGen.description: Tash-tourist is a Next.js platform showcasing the city's attractions, cuisine, and culture with travel guides and cost planning. Built with TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, it includes a community forum for visitors to share experiences.

socialDash.title: Social Media Dashboard
socialDash.description: Analytics dashboard for tracking social media metrics across multiple platforms. Features data visualization, scheduled posts, and engagement analytics.

codeSnippet.title: Code Snippet Manager
codeSnippet.description: Developer tool for organizing and managing code snippets with syntax highlighting, tagging system, and search functionality.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question, want to collaborate on a project, or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
